tier.item: (1) a. Dare-ga paatii-ni ki-ta-ka?
who-Nom party-Dat come-Past-QP
`Who came to the party?'

Who came to the party?
b. JOHN-wa ki-ta
John-Top come-Past
`As for John, he came.'
(Implicature: It is possible that it is not the case that John and Mary came.
I don't know about others.)

(13) a. John-ga hon-o 3-satsu yon-da.

`John read 3 books.'

b. John-ga hon-o 3-satsu yom-eba, goukaku-suru.
John-Nom book-Acc 3-Class read-Comp, pass-do
`If John reads 3 books, he will pass.' (He will pass even if he reads 4.)

yesterday Mary-CTop house-dat came when, anyone exist-Neg-Past

a John ja sie nicht liebt.
